VideoOverlay

The VideoOverlay class is a class that creates a display area for showing MPEG I, WMV, H.264, theora, etc. It can also display on Kirikiri layers.
Prior to version 1.3.0, krmovie.dll was required in the same location as the Kirikiri executable when playing WMV/MPEG I.
From version 1.3.0 onwards, krmovie.dll was integrated into the main body, so there is no longer a need to attach it separately. To play theora, krdstheora.dll is required.

Except for playback on layers, in overlay playback, the VideoOverlay class display area is shown in front of all layers and cannot be transparent.
Layer playback tends to have a higher processor load during playback compared to overlay playback.
